flawed_nl_solution:
He returned 200*0.8=<<200*0.8=160>>160 people
So he had 200-160=<<200-160=40>>40 people
He took 10 of those to another planet so he took 40-10=<<25=25>>25 to his home planet
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
